name: 1 Inch Forged Sterling Silver Hoops - Antique Finish
description:
** Click on the image to see this item in close-up view **

Handcrafted and cold-forged by me from 18 gauge sterling silver wire, these beauties are a must have!

I have antiqued the sterling silver to give these hoops a nice rich organic look, then put them in the tumbler for several hours to get a glorious shine.

These beauties measure 1" in diameter. 

Other sizes are available upon request - Contact me for details. If you don't see the size you want, contact me for a special order :)

All content of this webstore, including pictures, jewelry designs and art content © Canadian Rockies Art by Nathalie

name: 1 Inch Forged Sterling Silver Hoops
description:
** Click on the image to see this item in close-up view **

Handcrafted and cold-forged by me from 18 gauge sterling silver wire, these beauties are a must have!

These earrings are in 'bright' Sterling Silver. I have put them in the tumbler for several hours to get a glorious shine.

These beauties measure 1" in diameter. 

Other sizes are available upon request - Contact me for details. If you don't see the size you want, contact me for a special order :)

name: Bright Fused Fine Silver Hoops
description:
** Click on the image to see this item in close-up view **

This pair of earrings is all about bright sparkles...

I have fused some Fine Silver (.999) into beautiful 1" hoops, then added in lots of texture by hand, to bring out lots of reflections in the light.

These stunning earrings hang from a pair of my handcrafted Sterling Silver sexy French ear wires, and measure approximately 1.75" tall from the top of the ear wires.

These earrings are also available in my shop with a rustic/oxidized finish. Contact me to let me know if you want these oxidized, otherwise I will automatically send these in 'bright' silver (as pictured).

All the content of this webstore, including pictures and jewelry designs © Canadian Rockies Art by Nathalie

name: Thick Sterling Silver Stackable Ring - Made To Order
description:
** Click on the image to see this item in close-up view **

This gorgeous band is made of thick Sterling Silver wire, and measures 2mm wide.

I have handcrafted and textured this ring on the front and sides for lots of sparkles. I put all the rings in the tumbler for several hours for a glorious shine and hardness.

You can wear one alone, or mix it with other rings according to your mood... or even use this ring as a wedding band, a couple's ring, or a promise ring.

If you want more than one ring to stack, please contact me for other quantities. This listing here is for one (1) single ring.


*** This ring is "Made To Order", and 'Quarter Ring Sizes' are available - See details below:


CUSTOM ORDERS: I would be happy to make this ring especially for you in your specific size. You can simply purchase this listing and indicate your ring size in the Notes to Seller. Please allow for 5 business days for fabrication before I can ship it out. If you need it faster or by a specific date (for a gift or a special occasion), please contact me so that we can work out the details first.

If you prefer the rings to be oxidized (antiqued), just let me know in the Notes to Seller during the checkout process. 

If you don't know your ring size simply contact me and I will be happy to help you figure out your size.


All content of this webstore, including pictures, jewelry designs and art content © Canadian Rockies Art by Nathalie

name: Delicate Stacked Rings - Set of 3 - Sterling Silver - Made To Order
description:
** Click on the image to see this item in close-up view **

This gorgeous trio of Sterling Silver rings is light and delicate (yet sturdy). Each ring is about 1mm wide, made of 16 gauge Sterling Silver wire.

I have carefully shaped, hammered and soldered these rings, then applied a light oxidizing medium and polished the high spots for some gorgeous reflections and contrasts. I put all the rings in the tumbler for several hours for a glorious shine and hardness.

These are textured on the front and sides for lots of sparkles. You can wear one, two, or all 3 stacked together or mix them with other rings according to your mood :)


*** This ring set is "Made To Order", and 'Quarter Ring Sizes' are available - See details below:


CUSTOM ORDERS: I would be happy to make this set of rings especially for you in your specific size. You can simply purchase this listing and indicate your ring size in the Notes to Seller. Please allow for 5 business days for fabrication before I can ship these out. If you need them faster or by a specific date (for a gift or a special occasion), please contact me so that we can work out the details first.

If you prefer the rings to be all bright sterling silver (no oxidation), just let me know in the Notes to Seller during the checkout process. 

If you don't know your ring size simply contact me and I will be happy to help you figure out your size.


All content of this webstore, including pictures, jewelry designs and art content © Canadian Rockies Art by Nathalie
